title: The Fall
summary: After a catastrophic fall during ascension, you awaken weakened. Droplet, a water spirit, guides you to rebuild your cultivation and gather spirits before investigating what happened.

dialogues.text: Memories flash through your mind. Mountain peak, power, ascension.
Something went wrong. Falling, darkness, pain.

You're finally awake! I've been waiting for you. You need to rebuild your strength. Go to the cultivation tab and upgrade you base cultivation rate. This will help you. in the next step. It will help you see me better too.

well done! now you can see me better. Something went wrong on the peak. You need to find out what happened. before we head out you need a spirit to protect yourself. Go to the summon tab and summon your first spirit and then go to spirit tab to assign them to your active party!
We'll have to keep cultivating and summoning spirits to get stronger. Lets head out for now and start our journey!

title: Getting Stronger
summary: Leveling up your mind and spirits to become stronger.

dialogues.text: Remember to level up your spirits to make them stronger. If you are low on QI, remember to cultivate to increase your income.

title: Elements
summary: Each element has another element that it's stronger or weaker to.

dialogues.text: Wood -> Earth -> Water -> Fire -> Metal -> Wood

title: Buffs and Debuffs
description: Learn the basics of buffs and debuffs.
summary: Buffs and debuffs can help turn the tide of battle.

dialogues.text: Buffs and debuffs can make your spirit stronger or the enemy spirit weaker.

title: Status Effects
description: Learn the basics of status effects.
summary: Status effects are powerful lingering effects.

dialogues.text: Status effects can do a lot of things and help turn the tide of battle to your favour.

title: Dual Elements
summary: Some spirits are of two elements.

dialogues.text: Some spirits have dual elements. This means they can be strong and weak against two types of elements instead of just one.

title: The Boss
description: Learn the basics of Qi cultivation.
summary: You train your first spirit and learn combat basics. A corrupted spirit blocks the path to a nearby town - you must prepare and defeat it.

dialogues.text: There's a small town up ahead, but there seems to be a corrupted spirit blocking the path. It's very strong so get your spirits prepared and take it on!
